difficulty.description: Difficulty level of the problem/task. Null if not available.

source.description: Source of the problem/task. Null if not available.

domain.description: Domain of the problem/task. Null if not available.

from.description: Indicates who is speaking (human or gpt).

value.description: The content of the conversation turn.

think.description: GPT's thought process (only present when 'from' is 'gpt'). Null if not available.
